original_text: And when the congregation had assembled against Moses and against Aaron, they turned toward the tent of meeting. And behold, the cloud covered it, and the glory of the Lord appeared.
korean_text: 회중이 모여 모세와 아론을 칠 때에 회막을 바라본즉 구름이 회막을 덮었고 여호와의 영광이 나타났더라

sentences.original_text: And when the congregation had assembled against Moses and against Aaron
sentences.korean_translation: 회중이 모세와 아론을 대항하여 모였을 때에

sentences.original_text: they turned toward the tent of meeting.
and the glory of the Lord appeared.
